name: tdv-react
description: React library that allows form validation manipulation through TypeScript Decorators

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && cp package.json README.md ./dist
scripts.deploy:minor: npm i --force && git commit -am 'bump react module minor version' && npm version minor --force && cd dist && npm publish --access=public && git push
scripts.deploy:major: npm i --force && git commit -am 'bump react module major version' && npm version major --force && cd dist && npm publish --access=public && git push
scripts.deploy:patch: npm i --force && git commit -am 'bump react module patch version' && npm version patch --force && cd dist && npm publish --access=public && git push

author: Bruno Tot
